00025 #include "syx-object.h"
00026 #include "syx-scheduler.h"
00027 
00028 #ifdef WINDOWS
00029   #ifndef WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00030   #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00031   #endif
00032   #include <windows.h>
00033   #include <winsock2.h>
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 #include "syx-platform.h"
00037 #include "syx-object.h"
00038 
00039 static SyxSchedulerPoll *_syx_scheduler_poll_windows = NULL;
00040 
00041 void
00042 _syx_scheduler_init_platform (void)
00043 {
00044 }
00045 
00046 void
00047 _syx_scheduler_poll_wait_platform (void)
00048 {
00049   SyxSchedulerPoll *wpoll = _syx_scheduler_poll_windows;
00050   SyxSchedulerPoll *oldwpoll = NULL;
00051   SyxSchedulerPoll *tmp = NULL;
00052   DWORD res;
00053 
00054   while (wpoll)
00055     {
00056       res = WaitForSingleObject ((HANDLE)wpoll->fd, 0);
00057       switch (res)
00058         {
00059         case WAIT_OBJECT_0:
00060           if (oldwpoll)
00061             oldwpoll->next = wpoll->next;
00062           else
00063             _syx_scheduler_poll_windows = wpoll->next;
00064           syx_semaphore_signal (wpoll->semaphore);
00065         case WAIT_ABANDONED:
00066           tmp = wpoll;
00067           wpoll = wpoll->next;
00068           syx_free (wpoll);
00069           break;
00070         default:
00071           oldwpoll = wpoll;
00072           wpoll = wpoll->next;
00073           break;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 void
00079 _syx_scheduler_quit_platform (void)
00080 {
00081   SyxSchedulerPoll *p, *pp;
00082 
00083   for (p=_syx_scheduler_poll_windows; p;)
00084     {
00085       pp = p;
00086       p = p->next;
00087       syx_free (pp);
00088     }
00089 
00090   _syx_scheduler_poll_windows = NULL;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void
00094 _syx_scheduler_save (FILE *image)
00095 {
00096   /* TODO: */
00097 }

00099 void
00100 _syx_scheduler_load (FILE *image)
00101 {
00102   /* TODO: */
00103 }
00104 
00111 void
00112 syx_scheduler_poll_read_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore)
00113 {
00114   SyxSchedulerPoll *p = (SyxSchedulerPoll *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxSchedulerPoll));
00115 
00116   p->fd = fd;
00117   p->semaphore = semaphore;
00118   p->next = _syx_scheduler_poll_windows;
00119   _syx_scheduler_poll_windows = p;
00120 }
00121 
00128 void
00129 syx_scheduler_poll_write_register (syx_nint fd, SyxOop semaphore)
00130 {
00131   SyxSchedulerPoll *p = (SyxSchedulerPoll *) syx_malloc (sizeof (SyxSchedulerPoll));
00132 
00133   p->fd = fd;
00134   p->semaphore = semaphore;
00135   p->next = _syx_scheduler_poll_windows;
00136   _syx_scheduler_poll_windows = p;
00137 }
